posts.author: Metriox
posts.content:
Clear-cut, and simple.

A PVP combat build focused on self-buffs, and possibly debuffing enemies, Bard as the primary class. Prefer Human, or Elf/Half Elf for the race. For weapons, any one handed weapon with a Tower Shield [Prefer Longsword].

Please post the build format, and make it easy to understand, and idiotproof. I have no idea how buffer builds work.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I'm just stopping by to say welcome to the Guild, Metriox! Good to have you here.

Alas, your request is way out of my particular comfort zone, but while you're waiting for someone better to come along, have you had a look at Mick Dagger's Guide to Bards in the Game Guides sub-forum? It might help with your thoughts on buffing...

Cheers!
